name: Daily Crossword Puzzle
description:
Best new Free crossword game with fresh daily puzzles which can give your brain some exercise. Play on the run, in the air, or just killing time. The intuitive and easy-to-use interface makes solving your favorite puzzles easier than ever before!

Enjoy the elegant UI design and the beautiful color schemes, unleash your vocabulary and expand your knowledge by solving 400+ free crossword puzzles, covers a wide range of your favorite topic: Movie, Music, Fashion, Sports, Arts, News and so on…

Every day is a new day in Daily Crossword Puzzle, get the fresh daily free puzzles from the calendar, keep solving puzzles to earn a gold trophy every month, skill up to unlock more achievements and challenge yourself with new statistic goals. It’s time to show off your puzzle prowess!

Game Features:

- 400+ crossword puzzles
- 14 well-designed puzzle packs with different themes
- 3 game modes with different fresh fun in mini, midi & classic
- A new puzzle everyday
- 50+ achievements, including 4 hidden bonus ones
- Collect monthly bronze, silver and gold trophy in daily puzzles
- Solve puzzles with tricks like check and reveal when you get stuck
- Play Anywhere, no-wifi needed

Download and play the Daily Crossword Puzzle now for FREE, enjoy the game with millions of our crossword enthusiasts!
